In Israel, where leaders have worried that the turmoil might jeopardize the country's peace treaty with Egypt, Benjamin Netanyahu welcomed reassurance from the military council that it respects all regional and international obligations and treaties. A total of 18 artifacts disappeared from the Egyptian Museum during the demonstrations and riots, including two statues of King Tutankhamun, Zahi Hawass , head of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on his website.
